My name's Ian. I mostly do back end web services stuff. I like black coffee and ambient music.

Latest Posts

  • Arch Installation on Dell XPS 13 (7390)

    20 April 2021 -- This post serves as an account of, as well as an instructional reference for, the quirks of installing Arch GNU/Linux on the XPS 13 7390.

  • Facebook's Redesigns and You

    16 March 2021 -- Recall the early Facebook, where your religion, sexuality, politics, and hometown were prominently displayed under your profile picture. Remember joining groups or delcaring your interest in a particular topic? Do you remember removing it?

  • Finding Old Xanga Posts Right Where I Left Them

    4 February 2021 -- The most popular blogging platform of 2005 holds many of our most embarrassing online musings. It would be a shame if someone found them!

  • Headless Pi-hole Setup With DietPi

    5 May 2020 -- Here’s a quick account of my experience deploying the Pi-hole application with a minimal image over SSH.

  • You Have a Heart of Gold

    6 October 2019 -- For the 10th anniversary of Demon’s Souls, here’s my heretical take on enjoying this game: forget the lore.
